SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT d.CO_ID, d.BR_ID, H.FISCAL_YEAR, H.PERIOD_NO, d.ACCOUNT_NO, d.COST_CENTER, d.CURR_ID, H.JOURNAL_DT, H.JOURNAL_NO, d.KET_DT, d.DEBIT_HOME, d.CREDIT_HOME, H.STATUS, H.CURR_RATE AS CURR_RATE_HD, h.REF_NO, H.KET_HD, replace(A.Comments, ';', '-') Comments FROM dbo.GL_JURNALD AS d INNER JOIN dbo.GL_JURNALH AS H ON d.CO_ID = H.CO_ID AND d.BR_ID = H.BR_ID AND d.JOURNAL_NO = H.JOURNAL_NO LEFT JOIN ALLDOC_VIEW A ON IIF(CHARINDEX('-', H.JOURNAL_NO) = 0, H.JOURNAL_NO, LEFT(H.JOURNAL_NO, CHARINDEX('-', H.JOURNAL_NO) - 1)) = A.TrackNo where d.CO_ID = ':1' and d.BR_ID = ':2' and h.FISCAL_YEAR = :3 and h.PERIOD_NO = :4 and d.ACCOUNT_NO = ':5' and d.COST_CENTER = ':6' :7 :8 :9 :10 order by H.JOURNAL_NO ASC

ExpSyntax.val: IF(NOT {2,18}, '', ' AND (H.JOURNAL_DT BETWEEN ' & ASCIIChr(39) & DStr({0,3}, Trim({32768,36}) ) & ASCIIChr(39) & ' AND ' & ASCIIChr(39) & DStr({0,4}, Trim({32768,36}) ) & ASCIIChr(39) & ')')
IF(NOT {2,18} OR Trim({0,5}) = '', '', ' AND H.JOURNAL_NO LIKE ' & ASCIIChr(39) & '%' & Trim({0,5}) & '%' & ASCIIChr(39))
IF(NOT {2,18} OR Trim({0,6}) = '', '', ' AND H.REF_NO LIKE ' & ASCIIChr(39) & '%' & Trim({0,6}) & '%' & ASCIIChr(39))

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT d.CO_ID, d.BR_ID, H.FISCAL_YEAR, H.PERIOD_NO, d.ACCOUNT_NO, d.COST_CENTER, d.CURR_ID, H.JOURNAL_DT, H.JOURNAL_NO, d.KET_DT, d.DEBIT_HOME, d.CREDIT_HOME, H.STATUS, H.CURR_RATE AS CURR_RATE_HD, h.REF_NO, H.KET_HD FROM dbo.GL_JURNALD AS d INNER JOIN dbo.GL_JURNALH AS H ON d.CO_ID = H.CO_ID AND d.BR_ID = H.BR_ID AND d.JOURNAL_NO = H.JOURNAL_NO where d.CO_ID = ':1' and d.BR_ID = ':2' and h.FISCAL_YEAR = :3 and h.PERIOD_NO = :4 and d.ACCOUNT_NO = ':5' and d.COST_CENTER = ':6' :7 :8 :9 :10

ExpSyntax.val: IF(NOT {2,18}, '', ' AND (H.JOURNAL_DT BETWEEN ' & ASCIIChr(39) & DStr({0,3}, Trim({32768,36}) ) & ASCIIChr(39) & ' AND ' & ASCIIChr(39) & DStr({0,4}, Trim({32768,36}) ) & ASCIIChr(39) & ')')
IF(NOT {2,18} OR Trim({0,5}) = '', '', ' AND H.JOURNAL_NO LIKE ' & ASCIIChr(39) & '%' & Trim({0,5}) & '%' & ASCIIChr(39))
IF(NOT {2,18} OR Trim({0,6}) = '', '', ' AND H.REF_NO LIKE ' & ASCIIChr(39) & '%' & Trim({0,6}) & '%' & ASCIIChr(39))

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT d.CO_ID, d.BR_ID, H.FISCAL_YEAR, H.PERIOD_NO, d.ACCOUNT_NO, d.COST_CENTER, d.CURR_ID, H.JOURNAL_DT, H.JOURNAL_NO, d.KET_DT, d.DEBIT_HOME, d.CREDIT_HOME, H.STATUS, H.CURR_RATE AS CURR_RATE_HD, h.REF_NO FROM dbo.GL_JURNALD AS d INNER JOIN dbo.GL_JURNALH AS H ON d.CO_ID = H.CO_ID AND d.BR_ID = H.BR_ID AND d.JOURNAL_NO = H.JOURNAL_NO where d.CO_ID = ':1' and d.BR_ID = ':2' and h.FISCAL_YEAR = :3 and h.PERIOD_NO = :4 and d.ACCOUNT_NO = ':5' and d.COST_CENTER = ':6'

SELECT d.CO_ID, d.BR_ID, H.FISCAL_YEAR, H.PERIOD_NO, d.ACCOUNT_NO, d.COST_CENTER, d.CURR_ID, H.JOURNAL_DT, H.JOURNAL_NO, d.KET_DT, d.DEBIT_HOME, d.CREDIT_HOME, H.STATUS, H.CURR_RATE AS CURR_RATE_HD, h.REF_NO FROM dbo.GL_JURNALD AS d INNER JOIN dbo.GL_JURNALH AS H ON d.CO_ID = H.CO_ID AND d.BR_ID = H.BR_ID AND d.JOURNAL_NO = H.JOURNAL_NO where d.CO_ID = ':1' and d.BR_ID = ':2' and h.FISCAL_YEAR = :3 and h.PERIOD_NO = :4 and d.ACCOUNT_NO = ':5' and d.COST_CENTER = ':6'

select V.CO_ID, V.BR_ID, V.FISCAL_YEAR, V.PERIOD_NO, V.ACCOUNT_NO, V.COST_CENTER, V.CURR_ID, V.JOURNAL_DT, V.JOURNAL_NO, V.KET_DT, V.DEBIT_HOME, V.CREDIT_HOME, V.STATUS, V.CURR_RATE_HD, J.REF_NO from GL_LEDGER_VIEW V (nolock) left join GL_JURNALH J (nolock) on V.JOURNAL_NO = J.JOURNAL_NO where V.CO_ID = ':1' and V.BR_ID = ':2' and V.FISCAL_YEAR = :3 and V.PERIOD_NO = :4 and V.ACCOUNT_NO = ':5' and V.COST_CENTER = ':6'
